participant_1.background:
I run and play frisbee with my dog.
i am a professional basketball player.
i am a geology major at alabama university.
I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
i listen to a fall out boy record every day.

participant_2.background:
I am a freelancer because I can choose my own hours and work from anywhere.
i didn t go to college because i run the family farm.
i am single and live alone.
My biggest fear is that my dogs will run off and get lost.
My family is very supportive of my writing.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing?
Hey, doing well! How about yourself?
I'm doing alright. I just got done with a long day at work.
Oh yeah, what do you do for work?
I'm a professional basketball player.
Oh wow, that's awesome! What's it like being a professional athlete?
It's pretty great, but it can also be really tough. The travel can be a lot, and the hours are long. But it's all worth it when you get to play the game you love.
That's really cool. I'm sure it's a lot of fun. I'm a freelancer, so I can choose my own hours and work from anywhere.
That sounds nice. I wish I had more freedom with my schedule.
Yeah, it's definitely nice. But it can also be lonely, since I don't have a lot of coworkers.
I can understand that. I have a lot of teammates, but we're all so busy with our own lives that we don't always get to hang out.
Yeah, that's definitely true. But it's nice to have people who understand what you're going through.
Yeah, it is. So, what do you do for fun?
I like to write, and I also love to spend time with my dogs.
That's cool. I like to run and play frisbee with my dog.
Oh, that's fun! I used to run a lot, but I don't have as much time for it anymore.
Yeah, I know what you mean. It's hard to find time for everything.
Yeah, but it's important to make time for the things you love.
That's true. So, what's your favorite book?
It's hard to say, but I really like "The Great Gatsby."
That's a great book! I love the way Fitzgerald writes.
Yeah, he's one of my favorite authors.
Me too. So, what are you working on right now?
I'm working on a new novel. It's about a woman who moves to a new town and starts a new life.
Oh, that sounds interesting. I'd love to read it when it's finished.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's done.
Cool. So, what do you think your biggest fear is?
My biggest fear is that my dogs will run off and get lost.
That's a scary thought. I'm sure they're great dogs, though.
They are. They're my best friends.
That's good. So, what's your favorite thing to do with your dogs?
I love to take them for walks in the park
